body_html: Thanks @ezyang ! This looks good to me. Just started changing test_cuda.py, will use torch.FloatTensor as the corresponding cpu baseline for torch.cuda.HalfTensor since most operations are not implemented in torch.HalfTensor.
body_text: Thanks @ezyang ! This looks good to me. Just started changing test_cuda.py, will use torch.FloatTensor as the corresponding cpu baseline for torch.cuda.HalfTensor since most operations are not implemented in torch.HalfTensor.
body: Thanks @ezyang ! This looks good to me. Just started changing test_cuda.py, will use torch.FloatTensor as the corresponding cpu baseline for torch.cuda.HalfTensor since most operations are not implemented in torch.HalfTensor.
